TopicTitle: The KSP Forum Plays Europa Universalis IV

Articles.Content:
Hello queens and kings, let's play some EU4! For those unaware of this amazing game, Europa Universalis IV (Often shortened to EUIV/EU4) is a grand strategy game (fourth in it's series), developed by Paradox! You control a nation of your choosing (Or creation, with the El Dorado DLC) and lead it through the turbulent times of the Early Modern Period (Specifically 1444-1821), and can do many things, ranging from diplomacy to trade to conflict to colonialism, and most things in between. I've been playing for a good 320 hours, so I know my way around the game. The (gameplay) DLCs that I will be using are:

- Conquest of Paradise
- Res Publica
- Wealth of Nations
- Art of War
- El Dorado
- Women in History
- 

No Common Sense, as I do not have it. \*cries\*

This thread is inspired by [this really cool thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/78084-The-KSP-Forum-plays-Spore).

So now the first question: Who should we play as?

I'm thinking a custom nation. What should we call it? What religion should it be? Where should it be? What should it be focused on? The flag?

You decide (almost) each and every move!

Le Tiny Print: Updates happen when I choose to. This game is being played alongside my Milan-Italy-Roman Empire Borders run, so progress may be slow. This will be my first time playing on ironman, so please don't mess up the directions *too* much! Please no OPMs in desolate areas, please no overly OP nations. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Western nation on the European part of the Ottomans?

Wish I could play this game rather than just owning it:(

> 
> -snip-
> No Common Sense, as I do not have it. \*cries\*
> 
> -snip-

Common Sense ain't that common. Also that part is kinda funny.

I'm a solid 20 or 25 hours into a playthrough of sweden right now. I'm lovin' this game ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif). We should definitely create a custom nation who prioritizes technology and the recklessness of Jebediah himself, much like the kerbal nation!

I like the tactical strategy of total war (lining up in battle lines, flanking, ect...) to the broad grand strategy of EU, but I greatly anticipate the progress of this thread.

Custom nation idea:

Artemistra

Noble Republic Government

as for the other stuff I have no Ideas. ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

GOOD LUCK!

Is this gonna be a multiplayer thing or are you playing it and telling us what is going on? Also the name should be Kerbolian Empire with the ruler as Jeb Kerman 6/6/6 stats ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/kxrC9)

As I don't have Common Sense, I can't upgrade to an empire. But when we reach 1,000 development, I'll start calling the leaders by the appropriate title.

Who should we rival? Should we eat Ragusa before Venice gets to her?

EDIT: Forgot to turn on ironman ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)
